questions.minister: Minister of Commerce, Trade and Industry
parts: (a) whether the Government is aware that the mealie meal prices in Nakonde District have risen to about K400 per 25kg bag; and

(b) if so, what measures are being taken to ensure that the Zambia National Service (ZNS) mealie meal, which sells at K230 per 25kg bag is availed to all parts of the country that do not have prescribed ZNS outlets.

(c) why the increment is only targeted at public schools in the Constituency.
